video.title: American Dad!
video.synopsis: This comedy follows a conservative CIA agent and his eccentric brood, which includes a talking goldfish with the brain of an East German athlete.

episodes.synopsis: Stan rigs the school election to help Steve score with girls, but the plan backfires when Steve wins and becomes drunk with power.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Stan steals Steve's lucrative idea to stage and videotape "bum fights," in which homeless men are forced to beat each other senseless.
episodes.title: Threat Levels

episodes.synopsis: Hayley takes a job as a stripper. Steve claims Roger is his disfigured sister in order to gain sympathy points and "get boob" at the school dance.
episodes.title: Stan Knows Best

episodes.synopsis: After forgetting his wedding anniversary, Stan arranges to have the last 20 hours of Francine's memory erased, but it is accidentally erased 20 years.
episodes.title: Francine's Flashback

episodes.synopsis: When Roger slips into a coma, the Smiths think he's dead. While the family copes with their loss, Roger awakens to find he's being pursued by the CIA.
episodes.title: Roger Codger

episodes.synopsis: Stan panics after discovering that his new neighbors are Arab-American. Meanwhile, Steve finds himself at the mercy of the Scout Rangers.
episodes.title: Homeland Insecurity

episodes.synopsis: Stan competes with his neighbor to become deacon of his church, and Steve gets pregnant as Roger goes through his alien reproductive cycle.
episodes.title: Deacon Stan, Jesus Man

episodes.synopsis: Barely legal 18-year-old Hayley is sleeping with Stan's boss, Bullock -- but Stan can't say or do anything about it because he's up for a promotion!
episodes.title: Bullocks to Stan

episodes.synopsis: Stan hates the sex education program at Steve's school, so he decides to teach Steve himself and becomes addicted to sexual self-gratification!
episodes.title: A Smith in the Hand

episodes.synopsis: Stan must rely on his son's knowledge of science fiction to catch a cyberterrorist. Roger attends a sci-fi convention to interact with humans.
episodes.title: All About Steve

episodes.synopsis: Stan's real father reappears after a 20-year absence to recruit Stan for a top-secret mission, but Francine suspects that he's a con man.
episodes.title: Con Heir

episodes.synopsis: Stan is reassigned to Saudi Arabia, where the Smiths experience culture shock stemming from their new country's male-dominated social norms.
episodes.title: Stan of Arabia Part I

episodes.synopsis: Cultures continue to clash, and after the entire Smith family is arrested by the Vice and Virtue Police, they are sentenced to death by stoning.
episodes.title: Stan of Arabia Part II

episodes.synopsis: Hayley accidentally paralyzes Stan when she fires a gun she thought was loaded with blanks. Roger convinces Steve that he's adopted.
episodes.title: Stannie Get Your Gun

episodes.synopsis: Roger is overjoyed to discover that Steve's new book is all about him -- until he finds out that it paints him in an unflattering light.
episodes.title: Star Trek

episodes.synopsis: Francine joins a group of housewives who cheat on their husbands; Stan befriends a tiny dog; and Hayley locks Steve and Klaus in a closet.
episodes.title: Not Particularly Desperate Housewives

episodes.synopsis: When Stan and Roger agree to trade places, Roger gets a job as a car salesman, while Stan gets drunk and ends up in jail.
episodes.title: Rough Trade

episodes.synopsis: After receiving a hefty bonus from work, Stan buys extravagant gadgets while Francine opens a muffin shop without his approval.
episodes.title: Finances with Wolves

episodes.synopsis: Because of a past incident at his own prom, where he had a pile of pigs dropped on him, Stan wants to show off that he married a homecoming queen.
episodes.title: It's Good to Be the Queen

episodes.synopsis: When Stan goes to Atlantic City for a bachelor party and is shunned by his so-called best friend, Roger steps in and becomes Stan's new sidekick.
episodes.title: Roger n' Me

episodes.synopsis: Stan devises a plan to make Steve more popular at school, but the plan backfires when the side effects make him a little "too popular."
episodes.title: Helping Handis

episodes.synopsis: Steve's friend Barry turns evil after skipping his meds. Roger's beer-drinking skills earn him membership in a college fraternity.
episodes.title: With Friends Like Steve's

episodes.synopsis: Stan enlists his CIA contacts to help fulfill Francine's wish: to destroy George Clooney. Roger starts his own vineyard using foster child labor.
episodes.title: Tears of a Clooney

episodes.synopsis: Stan is determined to send Steve to summer camp, but the only one he can find is in Africa. Francine and Roger pretend to be a married couple.
episodes.title: Camp Refoogee

episodes.synopsis: Steve introduces his girlfriend, and when Stan realizes that she is not a petite girl, his obsession with physical appearance gets out of control.
episodes.title: The American Dad After School Special

episodes.synopsis: Stan, the CIA's best interrogator, loses his confidence and his job when a car salesman gets the best of him in a negotiation.
episodes.title: Failure Is Not a Factory-Installed Option

episodes.synopsis: Stan wants to speak at the Republican National Convention, but the only GOP group that wants him to speak is the gay contingent.
episodes.title: Lincoln Lover

episodes.synopsis: Stan takes up drag racing to spice up his marriage with Francine. Meanwhile, Hayley breaks up with her boyfriend, Jeff, who is emotionally crushed.
episodes.title: Dungeons and Wagons

episodes.synopsis: When Steve's new relationship with his girlfriend gives Francine empty nest syndrome, she tries to convince Stan they should have another baby.
episodes.title: Iced, Iced Babies

episodes.synopsis: Francine discovers that Stan has been hiding a secret passion for competitive figure skating for the past 20 years and joins him as his pairs partner.
episodes.title: Of Ice and Men

episodes.synopsis: Roger and Steve set their sights on fortune in New York City. It doesn't take long for Roger to lose it all and for Steve to contemplate prostitution.
episodes.title: Irregarding Steve

episodes.synopsis: When an injunction prevents the town from lighting its annual Christmas tree, Stan blames secular nonbelievers for ruining his favorite holiday.
episodes.title: The Best Christmas Story Never Told

episodes.synopsis: When Stan enters an essay-writing contest to have President Bush over for dinner, he is overcome with joy when the president arrives at his doorstep.
episodes.title: Bush Comes to Dinner

episodes.synopsis: When Stan feels like he's not climbing the ladder fast enough at work, he turns to his lifelong ambition of making festive teddy bears.
episodes.title: American Dream Factory

episodes.synopsis: After being rejected by Steve, Roger heads out in search of a new human pal. But when this new friend starts to abuse Roger, Steve and Hayley step in.
episodes.title: A.T. the Abusive Terrestrial

episodes.synopsis: While researching a report about George Washington Carver, Steve uncovers a conspiracy that's been going on since the Civil War.
episodes.title: Black Mystery Month

episodes.synopsis: When Stan arrives late to a CIA nuclear drill and thinks it's real, he moves the family to the mountains to survive the perceived apocalypse.
episodes.title: An Apocalypse to Remember

episodes.synopsis: Stan sets Bullock up with a friend of Francine's. But when Bullock accidentally kills the woman, Stan helps him cover it up.
episodes.title: Four Little Words

episodes.synopsis: Francine insists on divorcing Stan so he can experience life as a bachelor again. Meanwhile, Steve becomes addicted to an energy drink.
episodes.title: When a Stan Loves a Woman

episodes.synopsis: When Stan brings home special equipment from the CIA to eavesdrop on conversations, he discovers how his neighbors really feel about him.
episodes.title: I Can't Stan You

episodes.synopsis: When Stan is prosecuted for sending cattle to the slaughterhouse, he recounts his story of how the ordeal started out as a quest to make Steve a man.
episodes.title: The Magnificent Steven

episodes.synopsis: When Roger finds out that Hayley's boyfriend is wanted for smuggling marijuana, he and Stan turn into bounty hunters and chase him across the country.
episodes.title: Joint Custody

episodes.synopsis: After discovering that all their family vacations have been artificial memories created by the CIA, Francine fumes and demands a real one.
episodes.title: The Vacation Goo

episodes.synopsis: In order to be taken more seriously, Stan becomes a meter maid. Now he gets the best tables at restaurants and impresses Francine with his prowess.
episodes.title: Meter Made

episodes.synopsis: Stan prays for a friend and thinks God sent him one, but Brett turns out to be an atheist. Roger convinces Steve that he's been accepted to Hogwarts.
episodes.title: Dope & Faith

episodes.synopsis: When Francine's adopted parents stop by for an unannounced stay, Stan is furious that they refuse to accept his "man of the house" ways.
episodes.title: Big Trouble in Little Langley

episodes.synopsis: When Hayley wants to move to France, Stan will do anything to stop her -- including revealing the fact that she was brainwashed as a child by the CIA.
episodes.title: Haylias

episodes.synopsis: Stan reveals that he has never actually killed anyone. It seems that every kill in Stan's history has been the result of fortunate timing.
episodes.title: The 42-Year-Old Virgin

episodes.synopsis: When Francine decides to be a surrogate for her gay neighbors, Stan kidnaps the baby and heads for Nebraska, where gay couples have no rights.
episodes.title: Surro-Gate

episodes.synopsis: After Stan comes home from another dangerous mission, he finds that his family has decked the halls with boughs of holly, but not to his satisfaction.
episodes.title: The Most Adequate Christmas Ever

episodes.synopsis: Francine fakes Roger's kidnapping in the hopes of showing Roger that Stan still cares about him, but Stan never shows up.
episodes.title: Frannie 911

episodes.synopsis: Stan and the family are characters in a Bond-style spoof in which Stan must stop Tearjerker (aka Roger), a diabolical film producer.
episodes.title: Tearjerker

episodes.synopsis: When Stan's mom gets dumped, she comes running to Stan for support. Feeling threatened, Francine is determined to cut Stan's umbilical cord.
episodes.title: Oedipal Panties

episodes.synopsis: Francine pushes Stan to open up to her, but she gets more than she bargained for when he tells her that he killed her best friend's husband.
episodes.title: Widowmaker

episodes.synopsis: Stan is shocked to learn that his neighbor is a former KGB agent. When the agent helps Steve build a rocket, Stan thinks Steve is now a communist.
episodes.title: Red October Sky

episodes.synopsis: Roger begins to release photos of himself to the local media for extra cash, prompting the CIA to initiate an Alien Task Force.
episodes.title: Office Spaceman

episodes.synopsis: Officially declared dead after an accident with a pudding truck, Stan comes back to life and realizes his dream of leaving a legacy on the world.
episodes.title: Stanny Slickers II: The Legend of Ollie's Gold

episodes.synopsis: Francine visits her parents over spring break. Roger wants to become "King of Spring Break" and invites college coeds to party at their home.
episodes.title: Spring Break-Up

episodes.synopsis: The Smiths get ready to celebrate Roger's big birthday, but they're sidetracked by Steve's horrifying announcement that he's going through puberty!
episodes.title: 1600 Candles

episodes.synopsis: When Roger discovers that someone has maxed out his credit card, he is certain it is identity theft and vows to bring down the crook.
episodes.title: The One That Got Away

episodes.synopsis: When Stan becomes his boss's go-to guy, he feels like he can't say no to anything, including outrageous personal requests.
episodes.title: One Little Word

episodes.synopsis: Stan is jealous when he finds out Francine was once engaged to a pilot whose plane crashed. Little does she know that her lost love is still alive.
episodes.title: Choosy Wives Choose Smith

episodes.synopsis: Steve plots to get revenge against the popular girls at school who torment losers ... like his girlfriend Debbie.
episodes.title: Escape from Pearl Bailey

episodes.synopsis: Hayley breaks up with her boyfriend and ends up in the arms of Stan's body double, but things get bizarre when the double starts hitting on Francine.
episodes.title: Pulling Double Booty

episodes.synopsis: When the CIA's budget gets cut, Roger suggests that Stan hold a telethon. When Stan takes credit for the idea, Roger tries his best to sabotage it.
episodes.title: Phantom of the Telethon

episodes.synopsis: When Steve finds out he has to wear a brace, he becomes the laughingstock of the school. Meanwhile, Roger takes Francine to a spa retreat.
episodes.title: Chimdale

episodes.synopsis: When Stan's co-worker gives him pills that allow him to stay up all night but feel like he slept a full eight hours, Stan is ecstatic.
episodes.title: Stan Time

episodes.synopsis: When the Smiths plan a family game night, Roger says he has prior commitments. But when he is caught in a lie, the Smiths feel stabbed in the back.
episodes.title: Family Affair

episodes.synopsis: When Langley Falls implements a ban on trans fats, Stan sets a poor example when he disregards the law by using Steve as a food mule.
episodes.title: Live and Let Fry

episodes.synopsis: When Stan forgets to pick up grenadine at the store, Roger goes ballistic and vows to get him back by taking over a project close to his heart.
episodes.title: Roy Rogers McFreely

episodes.synopsis: Steve signs Stan up for a bike tournament, but the plan veers off track when Stan admits that his father never taught him how to ride a bike.
episodes.title: Jack's Back

episodes.synopsis: Steve and the gang sabotage a stuck-up kid's bar mitzvah. But when Snot gets wrongly accused of stealing, he must answer to the rabbi.
episodes.title: Bar Mitzvah Hustle

episodes.synopsis: Stan reappears after being kidnapped, but trouble erupts when he admits he has a plan to marry his dentist if Francine dies before him.
episodes.title: Wife Insurance

episodes.synopsis: Stan is excited about building his dream car: a DeLorean. Francine encourages him to include Steve, so the two take a road trip in search of parts.
episodes.title: Delorean Story-An

episodes.synopsis: Steve joins a football team to make Stan proud. However, when Stan becomes head coach, Steve gets kicked off the team for not being good enough.
episodes.title: Every Which Way But Lose

episodes.synopsis: Stan has had enough of Roger's behavior. Roger declares that he has been sent to Earth as "the decider" to determine the fate of mankind.
episodes.title: Weiner of Our Discontent

episodes.synopsis: Neighbors Terry and Greg are nervous when Terry's father, football great Tank Bates, announces that he will be coming to town for a visit.
episodes.title: Daddy Queerest

episodes.synopsis: Stan goes out with the boys, but guys' night out goes from wild to reckless when Stan finds himself in one compromising situation after another.
episodes.title: Stan's Night Out

episodes.synopsis: When Steve is selected to sing the national anthem, he gets some heat from Stan, who doesn't think he's ready for such an undertaking.
episodes.title: In Country... Club

episodes.synopsis: To get a promotion at work, Stan has to convince the dictator of Isla Island to sign a treaty, but Stan meets the general and accidentally kills him.
episodes.title: Moon over Isla Island

episodes.synopsis: Steve is left home alone when the family takes a trip. When his friends realize he has the run of the house, they persuade him to break the rules.
episodes.title: Home Adrone

episodes.synopsis: Francine looks forward to her newfound alone time with Stan. There's only one problem: Roger is still living in the attic, fighting for attention.
episodes.title: Brains, Brains & Automobiles

episodes.synopsis: Stan nearly ruins Steve's birthday party by demanding that Steve act his age, but Francine saves the day by getting the moon bounce Steve wanted.
episodes.title: The Man in the Moonbounce

episodes.synopsis: Stan and Francine are set to renew their wedding vows until Stan reveals he only married Francine for her looks.
episodes.title: Shallow Vows

episodes.synopsis: When Hayley goes to a My Morning Jacket concert against Stan's wishes, he's furious. But when he hears their music, it calls to him and he's smitten.
episodes.title: My Morning Straitjacket

episodes.synopsis: Upset that Hayley no longer wants his advice, Stan takes it upon himself to improve a stripper's life and show Hayley that his advice works.
episodes.title: G-String Circus

episodes.synopsis: Francine tries to ease Stan's frustration when they go to church on Christmas Day and Stan can't get a good seat.
episodes.title: Rapture's Delight

episodes.synopsis: When Francine demands that Stan get rid of his SUV because it's costing too much money, he hatches a plan with Roger to avoid giving up his ride.
episodes.title: Don't Look a Smith Horse in the Mouth

episodes.synopsis: Stan puts down liberal programs because he thinks they're a waste of money and gives Francine a hard time for helping out at a homeless shelter.
episodes.title: A Jones for a Smith

episodes.synopsis: Stan gives Francine "love coupons" for Valentine's Day but refuses to honor them once he becomes preoccupied with his very own CIA cyborg.
episodes.title: May the Best Stan Win

episodes.synopsis: When Stan admits that his heroes include Ronald Reagan and the 1980 U.S. Olympic hockey team, Roger confesses that he played on the team.
episodes.title: Return of the Bling

episodes.synopsis: After Roger and Francine are victims of a mugging, Roger joins the police academy so he can learn how to defend himself and his loved ones.
episodes.title: Cops & Roger

episodes.synopsis: When Roger and Francine go wine tasting, Roger plants a big kiss on Francine in a drunken moment. Francine decides to tell Stan about this incident.
episodes.title: Merlot Down Dirty Shame

episodes.synopsis: Stan follows Steve around for the day and discovers that Steve shies away from obstacles, so he decides to bully Steve so that he'll toughen up.
episodes.title: Bully for Steve

episodes.synopsis: When an accident ruins the Smith family name, a humiliated Stan fakes his family's deaths and moves everyone out of Langley Falls to escape his shame.
episodes.title: An Incident at Owl Creek

episodes.synopsis: It's Roger's birthday, and he begs to be roasted. But when he ends up devastated by the jokes, he vows to pull his life together.
episodes.title: Great Space Roaster

episodes.synopsis: Hayley sends the family into chaos after she and her old boyfriend run off and elope. Stan offers a reward to whomever stops the couple.
episodes.title: 100 A.D

episodes.synopsis: After Stan creates a clone of Steve, Francine and Stan compete with each other to determine who has better parenting skills.
episodes.title: Son of Stan

episodes.synopsis: Stan and Francine have had the scariest haunted house on the block for eight years running, but this year a neighbor provides some stiff competition.
episodes.title: Best Little Horror House in Langley Falls

episodes.synopsis: Stan is ecstatic when Roger offers to help him live out his lifelong dream of opening a restaurant -- until their different visions cause havoc.
episodes.title: Stan's Food Restaurant

episodes.synopsis: After a heated argument, Stan and Francine go see a counselor, who hypnotizes Francine and reawakens her dream of being a comedian.
episodes.title: White Rice

episodes.synopsis: It's Thanksgiving in Langley Falls, and as usual, Stan invites his half-brother, Rusty, over to show off his cornucopia of wealth and good fortune.
episodes.title: There Will Be Bad Blood

episodes.synopsis: Stan relishes fulfilling his civic duty and anxiously awaits his annual jury summons. But it turns out Roger is the defendant in the trial!
episodes.title: The People vs. Martin Sugar

episodes.synopsis: Stan gives Steve a gun for Christmas, even though Francine warns him that Steve is too young. Stan ignores her, and Steve accidentally shoots Santa.
episodes.title: For Whom the Sleigh Bell Tolls

episodes.synopsis: After Roger releases lethal gas into the Smith residence, the family moves into a hotel while the fumes clear. Francine soon finds herself working.
episodes.title: Fartbreak Hotel

episodes.synopsis: When Stan and Francine meet a young couple, their lives get a shot of adrenaline as they try to keep up with the younger couple's crazy lifestyle.
episodes.title: Stanny Boy and Frantastic

episodes.synopsis: With a flair for the dramatic, Roger invites Stan to attend his acting class. However, tempers flare when they both audition for the same role.
episodes.title: A Piñata Named Desire

episodes.synopsis: When Stan and Roger disagree over a recent string of events, Roger moves out of the house in protest but is quickly replaced by another warm body.
episodes.title: You Debt Your Life

episodes.synopsis: When Steve challenges Stan for family dominance, Stan does everything he can to prove to Steve that he is the alpha male of the Smith house.
episodes.title: I Am the Walrus

episodes.synopsis: To advance in the CIA, Stan begins playing golf with Sen. Buckingham. Things go well until Roger sells the senator's daughter to a drug lord.
episodes.title: School Lies

episodes.synopsis: When Steve has trouble crossing over into the "cool kids" social circle, Klaus and Roger place their bets to see how quickly Roger can make him cool.
episodes.title: License to Till

episodes.synopsis: After Snot professes his love for Hayley and gets shot down, Steve and Roger plan to cheer him up. Roger dresses up as Steve's cousin from New Jersey.
episodes.title: Jenny Fromdabloc

episodes.synopsis: Stan and Francine fight over how to redecorate the house. It goes so far that they split the house down the middle and try to live without each other.
episodes.title: Home Wrecker

episodes.synopsis: Francine gets a job at Stan's office, which cramps Stan's ability to flirt with co-workers. Francine retaliates with a little flirting of her own.
episodes.title: Flirting with Disaster

episodes.synopsis: Stan spends some quality father-son time with Steve at the local zoo, but things go horribly wrong when Steve slips into a gorilla exhibit.
episodes.title: Gorillas in the Mist

episodes.synopsis: Stan buys a hot tub for the back yard, but when it starts singing and encouraging some bad behavior, everyone's in trouble.
episodes.title: Hot Water

episodes.synopsis: A storm hits the towns of Stoolbend, Quahog and Langley Falls. When the Smiths decide to stay home, they must fight tooth and nail to survive.
episodes.title: Hurricane!

episodes.synopsis: When Stan and Francine go out of town, Roger eagerly takes over as Steve's caretaker and schemes to get Principal Lewis fired.
episodes.title: A Ward Show

episodes.synopsis: Desperate to realize his dream of being best man in somebody's wedding, Stan weasels his way into Principal Lewis's wedding party.
episodes.title: The Worst Stan

episodes.synopsis: Worried that his relationship with Steve is slipping away, Stan creates an avatar of a gorgeous blonde and sends her in Steve's direction.
episodes.title: Virtual In-Stanity

episodes.synopsis: Jealousy over Stan's old girlfriend inspires Francine to get revenge, and Steve discovers that wearing Hayley's underwear brings him good luck.
episodes.title: The Scarlett Getter

episodes.synopsis: While starring as Santa Claus during Father Donovan's annual Christmas pageant, Stan starts a fight with Roger, who is starring as Jesus.
episodes.title: Season's Beatings

episodes.synopsis: Steve adopts a superhero persona in order to impress Stan, and Francine is surprised to discover that she could be pregnant.
episodes.title: The Unbrave One

episodes.synopsis: Stan tries to teach Steve the value of hard work by getting him a job as groundskeeper at a posh country club, but the plan backfires.
episodes.title: Stanny Tendergrass

episodes.synopsis: For kicks, Steve and Roger start up a pretend detective agency, but Stan ruins everything when he insists on playing along, and then gets kidnapped.
episodes.title: Wheels & the Legman and the Case of Grandpa's Key

episodes.synopsis: After Stan spouts off about his disdain for the elderly, an old man invokes a curse that gives Stan a taste of his own medicine.
episodes.title: Old Stan in the Mountain

episodes.synopsis: When Stan discovers that his precious high school wrestling record is in jeopardy, he persuades Roger to take down the challenger.
episodes.title: The Wrestler

episodes.synopsis: Under the guise of offering counseling, Klaus drives the Smith family apart by exposing the dirty little secrets they are keeping from each other.
episodes.title: Dr. Klaustus

episodes.synopsis: When Steve's dog has an accident, Stan, who never wanted the dog in the first place, has a change of heart and won't take the pooch off life support.
episodes.title: Stan's Best Friend

episodes.synopsis: Stan and Francine try to show Hayley and Jeff how to live thriftily, but the experiment proves to be more difficult than they expected.
episodes.title: Less Money, Mo' Problems

episodes.synopsis: After Hayley's excessive drinking leads to kidney failure, Stan discovers during a transplant donor search that he might not be her biological father.
episodes.title: The Kidney Stays in the Picture

episodes.synopsis: Roger resurrects his sinister Ricky Spanish alter ego, just when Stan and Francine get a surprise visit from a Nigerian boy they used to sponsor.
episodes.title: Ricky Spanish

episodes.synopsis: Tired of Steve's childish playing, Stan takes him to Mexico to have sex with a hooker, but they wind up kidnapped by drug smugglers instead.
episodes.title: Toy Whorey

episodes.synopsis: Roger opens a crooner's bar in the Smith family's attic and recruits Hayley as his main entertainer.
episodes.title: Love, American Dad Style

episodes.synopsis: The Smiths take a killer vacation.
episodes.title: Killer Vacation

episodes.synopsis: Francine fears that she and Stan are growing apart because he spends so much time hanging out with his buddies at the CIA "chill house."
episodes.title: Can I Be Frank With You?

episodes.synopsis: Stan gets a new "stepdad."
episodes.title: American Stepdad

episodes.synopsis: Stan tries to separate Steve and Snot.
episodes.title: Why Can't We Be Friends?

episodes.synopsis: Hayley baby-sits Steve.
episodes.title: Adventures in Hayleysitting

episodes.synopsis: Francine's dark past is revealed.
episodes.title: National Treasure 4: Baby Franny: She's Doing Well: The Hole Story

episodes.synopsis: The Smith family tries to break bad habits.
episodes.title: Finger Lenting Good

episodes.synopsis: Francine tries to teach Roger a lesson.
episodes.title: The Adventures of Twill Ongenbone and His Boy Jabari

episodes.synopsis: A Smith family secret is revealed.
episodes.title: Blood Crieth Unto Heaven

episodes.synopsis: The Smith family takes advantage of Roger.
episodes.title: Max Jets

episodes.synopsis: Jeff discovers Roger is an alien.
episodes.title: Naked to the Limit, One More Time

episodes.synopsis: Stan is assigned a high-stakes mission.
episodes.title: For Black Eyes Only

episodes.synopsis: Francine discovers Steve's special talent that will help him get into a great school: spelling.
episodes.title: Spelling Bee My Baby

episodes.synopsis: Francine tries to spice things up in the bedroom.
episodes.title: The Missing Kink

episodes.synopsis: Francine turns Stan into the perfect husband.
episodes.title: The Boring Identity

episodes.synopsis: Stan becomes agent Bullock's new protégé.
episodes.title: The Full Cognitive Redaction of Avery Bullock by the Coward Stan Smith

episodes.synopsis: Trapped on a spaceship, Jeff must prove to the alien emperor that he's truly in love with Hayley in order to return to Earth.
episodes.title: Lost in Space

episodes.synopsis: Klaus discovers his original human body, but Stan refuses to help him switch back.
episodes.title: Da Flippity Flop

episodes.synopsis: Steve and Snot use the CIA's cloning machine to make two willing dates for their upcoming high school prom, but things go horribly wrong.
episodes.title: Steve and Snot's Test-Tubular Adventure

episodes.synopsis: After Stan fails to satisfy Francine in the sack, her "Poltergasm" begins haunting the household, so Roger conjures up a medium to stop it.
episodes.title: Poltergasm

episodes.synopsis: To prove that he's no longer a little boy, Steve goes hunting with Stan, Bullock and the CIA, while Roger and Klaus go on a road trip.
episodes.title: Buck, Wild

episodes.synopsis: To prove that she's cool, Francine teaches Steve to shoplift, but their big heist goes awry. Meanwhile, Roger, Hayley and Klaus form a musical trio.
episodes.title: Crotchwalkers

episodes.synopsis: Francine thwarts Stan's Thanksgiving plans of watching football in his underwear, and Francine's mom invites an eligible bachelor over for Hayley.
episodes.title: Kung Pao Turkey

episodes.synopsis: Steve and friends take off on a cross-country road trip to Snot's father's funeral, and Stan and Roger invent an automatic cake-cutter.
episodes.title: Independent Movie

episodes.synopsis: In this "Breaking Bad" parody, Hayley uses Steve's skills to create a fake ID business, but they run afoul of the Langley Falls fake ID kingpin.
episodes.title: Faking Bad

episodes.synopsis: When a legendary demon who punishes naughty children kidnaps Steve, Stan and Roger must rescue him. Meanwhile, Hayley gets a job at the airport.
episodes.title: Minstrel Krampus

episodes.synopsis: When Roger wakes up from a coma and starts having "Dead Zone"-esque visions of the future, it leads to trouble in the Smith household.
episodes.title: Vision: Impossible

episodes.synopsis: When the evil, cryogenically frozen founder of a medieval-themed amusement park is thawed out during the Smiths' visit, they're taken prisoner.
episodes.title: Familyland

episodes.synopsis: After making his 100th kill, Stan inadvertently unleashes a "good" Stan in his sleep, one who is determined to stop him from killing again.
episodes.title: Cock of the Sleepwalk

episodes.synopsis: Steve and Roger switch faces so Steve can win the hot girl at school, while Stan and Francine pose as airline stewardesses to stop an evil plot.
episodes.title: Introducing...The Naughty Stewardesses

episodes.synopsis: Frustrated that Steve never plays outside, Stan drugs him and his friends and takes them to the CIA holodeck, while Hayley claims to be Roger's queen.
episodes.title: I Ain't No Holodeck Boy

episodes.synopsis: Stan takes an experimental drug, but it has a disastrous side effect, which Klaus and Roger try to use to their benefit.
episodes.title: Stan Goes on the Pill

episodes.synopsis: Stan attempts to infiltrate the "Occupy" movement but gets captured instead. When he's returned home, Hayley worries that he's been "turned."
episodes.title: Honey, I'm Homeland

episodes.synopsis: Stan forces Hayley to become a bartender in Roger's attic haunt, and when Bullock becomes her best customer, Stan tries to use it to get ahead.
episodes.title: She Swill Survive

episodes.synopsis: Stan causes a major accident when he tries to check out a woman while driving, and Roger and Klaus spill wine on the Smiths' new couch.
episodes.title: Rubberneckers

episodes.synopsis: Stan is fired and forced to take a job at a grocery store where Steve is the manager. Meanwhile, Roger makes a bet with an annoying musician.
episodes.title: Permanent Record Wrecker

episodes.synopsis: Hayley starts an internship at a local news station working for a Nancy Grace-type reporter, who is actually Roger in disguise.
episodes.title: News Glance with Genevieve Vavance

episodes.synopsis: A year after Jeff's abduction, Hayley meets a millionaire who may help her move on, until Jeff makes contact from space via CB radio.
episodes.title: The Longest Distance Relationship
